Articles.Content:
Food coma

What is KSP 64-bit was 100% stable?

Then everyone would install so many mods that it would create a singularity which would destroy the Kraken.

What if NASA's budget went up?

They would eventually create a Deep Space Kraken with all of their money.

What if these what-if scenarios were more plausible?

Edited September 8, 2014 by Tery215

Then they would be BORING!

What if tomorrow, when you woke up, there was a massive alien mother ship floating over your home. When you turned on the news, the news man/woman who had too much plastic surgery would say that there was a ship just like the one outside hovering over every major city in the world. Nobody knew why they were there. No contact had been made with whatever was inside. Already political tensions were rising, world leaders were pointing fingers at each other, and fighter jets were flying around the ships and awaiting orders to strike.

Then it would have been revealed that someone's been watching too much Independence Day.

What if we didn't need to sleep?

Then the world would fall into anarchy, because primitive social needs.

If there was no need, very little would happen, except that people would waste a lot of energy.

What if the earth was made with CSG?

How do you know it's not?

What if there were three temporal dimensions?

Good luck going into the past.

What if fusion took three times as much pressure as it does now?

Stuff and stars would be harder and science.

What if I secretly disliked ponies and I just used ponies as a test to see how people react?

Then you'd confuse everyone who looks between your avatar and sig and your hypothetical dislike of ponies.

What if Eeloo isn't actually lonely, and is secretly plotting the demise of all Kerbals?

Kerbals would be annihilated by Eeloo passing through kerbin.

?what if fi tahw?

Then you would dluow uoy nehT

What if you sealed an entire house inside a massive solid glass block?

Then you couldn't breathe.

What if you combined the characters of Jebediah and Bill?

Then you would form Jebilldiah Kerman, who would probably suffer from severe anxiety but would be a great pilot.

What if it got cold and snowed on every summer solstice, then returned to normal the next day?

Then people in the Southern Hemisphere won't notice a thing.

If what I bell taco ate?

Would then you sick get die and.

What if I stopped posting in all forum games I'm participating in right now?

Life would go on.

What if pi r not squared?

Then area of a circle would be A=Ãâ‚¬rCIRCLED

what if bill was not kill?

If he is he will with jeb and start exploding things

What if the universe NEVER existed?

Then no one would be around to ask that what-if, eh?

What if what-if if what what ifs whats?

How much wood would a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?

What if you hurled a baseball at 0.99c?

Then it would destroy everything as its nuclei underwent fusion with the air.

What if my hair was twenty feet long and wasn't affected by gravity?

You would be pulled into the upper atmosphere by your hair.

What if I had more money?

You would be pulled into the lower asthenosphere by your money.

What if I didn't keep running out of food?

Then you will starve.

What if kerbin or earth do not have clouds or water?
